tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE vendors (vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vendor_name VARCHAR(255), vendor_email VARCHAR(255), vendor_phone VARCHAR(15), documents JSONB) CREATE TABLE agreements (agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vendor_id INT, agreement_text TEXT, agreement_date TIMESTAMPTZ)

CREATE TABLE vendor_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id UUID,
    document_name STRING,
    document_type STRING,
    uploaded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id UUID,
    certification_type STRING,
    issued_date TIMESTAMP,
    expiration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE agreements (
    agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id UUID,
    agreement_type STRING,
    agreement_terms TEXT,
    agreement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_info (
    vendor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name STRING,
    contact_email STRING,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP,
    contract_signed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  vendor_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  vendor_phone VARCHAR(20),
  vendor_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_date DATE,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  certification_authority VARCHAR(100),
  certification_expiry DATE,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agreements (
  agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agreement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  agreement_type VARCHAR(50),
  agreement_start DATE,
  agreement_end DATE,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);
